T02D2934:344b-1: n'i l'amba ra badzra dha ra badzra p'a ni ro sha s'a dha nam /
T02D2934:344b-3: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gtum po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2934:344b-5: g-yon brkyang pa yi gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2934:344b-6: rdo rje bsnams shing klu rnams 'dul //
T02D2934:344b-7: rgyal ldan khro bo'i rgyal la 'dud //
T02D2934:344b-8: ji ltar rtog pa rgyud nas bri //
T02D2934:344b-9: snying brtse shes rab dad dang //
T02D2934:344b-10: dbang dang rjes gnang sgrub pa pos //
T02D2934:344b-11: gnas khang me tog gcal bkram nas //
T02D2934:344b-12: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
T02D2934:344b-13: rje btsun la sogs spyan drangs nas //
T02D2934:344b-14: mchod cing bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D2934:344b-15: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2934:344b-16: de nas rang sems h'um du bsams //
T02D2934:344b-18: de nas h'um las gzhal yas ni //
T02D2934:344b-19: rdo rje sngon po lte bar bcas //
T02D2934:344b-20: gru bzhi sgo bzhi zla ba'i gdan //
T02D2934:344b-21: h'um las rdo rje sku bskyed de //
T02D2934:344b-22: brkyang bskum ljang nag rdo rje g-yas //
T02D2934:344b-23: sbrul dang stag lpags sdig pa g-yon //
T02D2934:344b-24: khro bo'i zhal mdog thugs kar h'um //
T02D2934:344b-25: de las khro bo bzhi po 'phros //
T02D2934:344b-26: khams gsum rgyal dang shin tu khros //
T02D2934:344b-27: rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02D2934:344b-28: sgo bzhi dag tu bsam par bya //
T02D2934:344b-29: sku mdog ljang nag phur bu bsnams //
T02D2934:344b-30: zla ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs //
T02D2934:344b-31: ye shes la sogs spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2934:344b-32: sku gsung byin brlab gnas drug bsrung /
T02D2934:344b-33: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2934:344b-34: pra dzny'anta kri ta k'i li k'i l'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2934:344b-35: tsu tu tsu ru tsanda k'i l'i k'i l'a ya phat /
T02D2934:344b-36: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya phat /
T02D2934:344b-37: na ma:tsanda aa mo gha k'e l'a ya phat ces bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2934:344b-38: gtor ma ni aom h'um hr'i:zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2934:345a-2: dam pa'i byin rlabs phan pa chen po thob //
T02D2934:345a-3: 'bras bu nye ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te //
T02D2934:345a-4: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'di //
T02D2934:345a-5: bdag gis 'thungs nas gzhan la phan phyir brtsams //
T02D2934:345a-6: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02D2934:345a-7: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
T02D2934:345a-8: bar chad thams cad rab zhi ste //
T02D2934:345a-9: phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar shog / phyag na
T02D2934:345a-10: rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs ao dyan gyi slob
T02D2934:345a-11: dpon aa mo pa na dha zhes bya bas mdzad
T02D2934:345a-13: / pandi ta de pa purna m'a ti dang /
